data.title: About Us
data.text:
Since 1995, Hometown Hardware has been serving New Jerseyâ€™s Bergen County with outstanding customer service and product selection. Nestled in the Northeast corner of the state in Closter, NJ, we're proud to offer a huge selection of cooking & cleaning supplies, lawn & garden supplies, hardware and fasteners, a great selection of Weber grills, Yeti Coolers, Big Green Egg grills, Benjamin Moore Paint and more.

Hometown Hardware provides both products and handyman services to customers in Closter, Demarest, Haworth, Alpine, Rockleigh, Old Tappan, Westwood, Dumont and Cresskill. Stop by your local, family-owned Hometown Hardware today!
